title: South Africa beat England by five runs to clinch second men’s ODI and series – live
summary: England looks to recover from a heavy defeat in the first ODI as they face South Africa at Lord's. The match promises to be a crucial test for the team. Follow our writers for live updates and analysis.

title: BrewDog posts £37m loss as sales growth slows to just 1%
summary: The 'punk' beer company has reported a significant rise in annual debt repayments, now totaling £17 million. This financial strain follows the recent departure of its founders, which has added to the company's challenges. The situation raises concerns about the company's future sustainability and leadership direction.

title: RFK Jr grilled in tense hearing about chaos at federal health agencies and vaccines – live updates
summary: Trump's health secretary is under fire for proposed layoffs and budget cuts within the department. Critics are questioning how these measures align with his commitment to 'make America healthy again.' The scrutiny comes amidst growing concerns about the implications for public health initiatives.

title: Corrections and clarifications
summary: The IAGS (International Academy of Global Studies) has adopted a new resolution aimed at addressing pressing global issues. This resolution stresses the importance of international collaboration and sustainable practices. It calls for action on climate change, public health, and social equity among nations.
